resources.string: Your pretend order has been placed! Have a real nice day!
Icons are provided by material.io/icons under the Apache License Version 2.0.
This is the course app used in the How Does Your App Grow? Udacity course by Google.
Plant descriptions are from Plants For a Future (http://www.pfaf.org/) and used under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License.
My Profile - How Often Do I Garden?

string-array.name: plant_descriptions
string-array.item:
Life Cycle: Perennial
Full Size: 1.5 m (5ft) by 1 m (3ft 3in)
Hardiness: zone (UK) 5
Flowers: August to October
Soil Type: light (sandy), medium (loamy), and heavy (clay). Prefers well-drained soil.
Suitable pH: acid, neutral and basic (alkaline) soils
Sunlight: Full sun
Watering: Dry or moist soil. Tolerates drought

Life Cycle: Perennial
Full Size: 1.5 m (5ft)
Hardiness: zone (UK) 8, frost tender
Flowers: Aug to September
Soil Type: light (sandy) and medium (loamy) soils. Prefers well-drained soil.
Suitable pH: acid, neutral and basic (alkaline) soils
Sunlight: Full sun or semi-shade
Watering: Dry or moist soil. Tolerates drought

Life Cycle: Biennial
Full Size: 1.2 m (4ft) by 0.3 m (1ft in)
Hardiness: zone (UK) 5. Not frost tender
Flowers: Jun to August
Soil Type: light (sandy), medium (loamy), and heavy (clay). Prefers well-drained soil.
Suitable pH: acid, neutral and basic (alkaline) soils
Sunlight: Full sun
Watering: Moist soil.

Life Cycle: Annual
Full Size: 2 m (6ft 7in)
Hardiness: zone (UK) 10. Frost tender
Flowers: Jul to September
Soil Type: light (sandy), medium (loamy), and heavy (clay). Prefers well-drained soil.
Suitable pH: acid, neutral and basic (alkaline) soils
Sunlight: Full sun
Watering: moist soil

Life Cycle: Perennial
Full Size: 3 m (9ft 10in) at a fast rate
Hardiness: zone (UK) 9. Is frost tender
Soil Type: light (sandy) and medium (loamy). Prefers well-drained soil.
Suitable pH: acid, neutral and basic (alkaline) soils
Sunlight: Full sun
Watering: moist soil

Life Cycle: Perennial
Hardiness: zone (UK) 6. Not frost tender
Flowers: August to October
Soil Type: light (sandy), medium (loamy), and heavy (clay).
Suitable pH: acid, neutral and basic (alkaline) soils
Sunlight: Full sun or semi-shade
Watering: moist soil

Life Cycle: Biennial
Full Size: 0.9 m (3ft)
Hardiness: zone (UK) 5. Not frost tender
Soil Type: light (sandy), medium (loamy), and heavy (clay). Prefers well-drained soil.
Suitable pH: acid, neutral and basic (alkaline) soils. can grow in very alkaline and saline soils.
Sunlight: Full sun
Watering: moist soil

Life Cycle: Biennial
Full Size: 0.9 m (3ft)
Hardiness: zone (UK) 7. Not frost tender.
Flowers: May to August
Soil Type: light (sandy), medium (loamy), and heavy (clay). Prefers well-drained soil.
Suitable pH: acid, neutral and basic

Life Cycle: Annual
Full Size: 2 m (6ft 7in)
Hardiness: Not frost tender.
Flowers: May to September
Soil Type: light (sandy) and medium (loamy). Prefers well-drained soil.
Suitable pH: acid, neutral and basic (alkaline) soils
Sunlight: Full sun
Watering: moist soil
